Get involved with dev/Mission

​There's lots of ways to support our young adults and our program by getting involved and being part of our movement. Help bridge the gap between diversity and tech!

Volunteer

We’re looking for volunteers to come in and support our program operations by providing admin support; teaching one of our competencies, guest speakers, and 1:1 coaching during our coding meetups sessions. Volunteer hours are very flexible and we ask commitment for a period of 3 months.

Volunteer Now!

Donate

Your donation will help support our Classroom environment, provide laptops and desktops for the students to use, provide scholarships for students and much more that will help contribute to the success of dev/Mission!

Donate Now!

Email

Thinking of another way to help out? Send us an email and let's set up a time to chat about it!

Shoot us an email!
